text: Rahah binti Mohamed Noah (11 June 1933 â€“ 18 December 2020) was a Malaysian socialite. She was the widow of former Malaysian Prime Minister Abdul Razak Hussein. Noah was born in Muar, Johor. Noah died on 18 December 2020 in Kuala Lumpur at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Socialites Category:People from Johor
title: Rahah Noah
